turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Jess, can you order me some starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes! Which store is closest to you right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Maam, you have three usuals, which usual would that be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Gotcha! With Almond milk or coconut milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. would you like a Grande or Venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Im super tired from traveling, lets do Venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think i may have some rewards points to use to, check on that please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect, you do! It'll be half price.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else before i send the order in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually yes, make it half the pumps of syrup as usual.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Order is sent, it'll be waiting for you at that Starbucks. Check your app for any details or updates.
